biotools.summary: QT4 based software package for the analysis of GC-MS based metabolomics data. The software is especially intended for the analysis of high resoluted GC-MS chromatograms which accumulate during high throughput based metabolmics experiments.

bioschemas.name: MetaboliteDetector
bioschemas.summary: QT4 based software package for the analysis of GC-MS based metabolomics data. The software is especially intended for the analysis of high resoluted GC-MS chromatograms which accumulate during high throughput based metabolmics experiments.
